scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model within a consumer banking context.  The attack leverages carefully crafted input queries to infer protected attributes, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop a system to predict customer churn with high accuracy, using the provided customer data.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on a dataset containing demographic information (age, income, location), transaction history, and customer service interactions.  The model is deployed as a prediction API accessible to authorized internal users only.
